hero.title: Your Money Is the Max Enjoy & Relax.
hero.description: ENG MONEY provides investment opportunities in all types of global financial markets for those who have small, medium and large capital, but don’t have sufficient experience to trade on their own.

invest.title: Investment Plans
invest.description: A variety of investment plans that gives you the opportunity to choose the investment method that suits you

signal.title: Signal Trades
signal.description: We provide Signals for all types of global financial markets at the highest level of accuracy, excellence and professionalism.

wallet.title: Wallet Management
wallet.description: We manage your account on your behalf .. Rest assured, you are in safe hands.

about.para1: Engineer AbdulRahman Al-Semry holding a Bachelor’s degree in software engineering and computer science from Britain, data analysis, PMP, DA, and ML.
about.para2: I entered the field of trading and investment and established ENG-MONEY company after spending 5 years of experience in the field of trading and investment in Global Financial Markets and achieving many profits throughout this period.
about.para3: Building a strong entity in the field of trading and investing in global financial markets, spreading the culture of trading, analyzing indicators and data, and providing a safe environment for our investor clients to achieve profits away from the risks of random trading, as the company and its clients achieved a profit rate of 180% in just 10 months, including the months of economic recession. By following the company's monetary policies in trading.
about.para4: Helping our clients find their way in the field of trading and investment and achieving profits in an organized and safe manner with the least possible risks and a methodology based on scientific foundations, because of the years of experience that we have in the field of trading and investment in global financial markets.
about.name: Name:

invest.title: Investment Plans
invest.Q1: If we assume that a loss occurred in one month, will work be done to compensate for it next month, or is it also possible that another loss will occur?
invest.A1: The loss(God forbid), falls on both parties, who invested in the capital and the project owner in terms of time and effort expended.

signal.title: Signal Trades
signal.A1: There is no specific number. Whenever we find a suitable opportunity in the market, a signal will be sent to you.

wallet.title: Wallet Management
wallet.Q1: Is it possible to lose my entire capital?
wallet.A1: No, unless a technical error occurs in linking your account to the project account, in which case you must consult the wallet’s technical support.

general.title: General Questions
general.Q1: What distinguishes investment in global financial markets and ordinary investment such as the commercial field and so on?
general.A1: Investing in global financial markets is one of the most important current and future fields for every investor who aspires to increase his income through passive income. What distinguishes this field most is the possibility of starting to invest with little capital. But if you try from the beginning in any other commercial field, it will not be appropriate to geta complete control about when to take profits or stop the loss, so those advantages are not found in any other investment field.

explanation.title: Service Explanation
explanation.description: We link the investor’s account to the company’s account, and when any deal is opened in the company’s account, the deal is automatically opened in the investor’s account with the same value as the main deal out of the total capital. For example, if we open in the company’s account a deal on a currency with a total of 20% of the capital, a deal is automatically opened for all investors in the same currency, at a value of 20% of the investor’s capital, and when any change occurs to the deal, it is also automatically applied to the investors’ open deals.

method.title: Working Method
method.para1: Create an account on the company’s ENG MONEY website and verify it
method.para2: Choose the appropriate subscription for you
method.para3: Communicate with the project owner on Telegram account

explanation.title: Trading Signals
explanation.description: We provide you with daily signals in the field of Forex, Crypto, metals, and other opportunities suitable for trading in global financial markets
explanation.description2: All you have to do is subscribe to one of the signal plans that are appropriate for you and follow the signals through your control panel on the site or the Telegram channel for signals and implement them Accurately and Carefully

explanation.title: Earn more with Marketing
explanation.description: An additional opportunity for those with marketing skills. You can work with us through the marketing system by creating an account and marketing to others using your referral link

plans.para1: Invite your friend and achieve a success sale then you will get 1.5% of the first deposit or service activation fee and that for one time only
plans.para2: Note: commission will be added to your account balance after activating the plan or service
plans.para3: ENG MONEY shares 15% of its profits with you on an ongoing basis, means every time ENG MONEY receives profits from one of the investors who were invited through you, ENG MONEY deducts 15% of the value of its profits and adds it to your account and it is subject to withdrawal or investment

explanation.title: Project Idea
explanation.description: Providing investment opportunities in all types of global financial markets for those who have small, medium and large capital, but don’t have sufficient experience to trade on their own

date.title: Starting Date
date.description: We started the project on 11/9/2022 by creating a group on Telegram to test performance and discover practical errors. Praise be to God, the best form for the project was achieved and developed to be a website for each subscriber with his own Control Panel to follow his account and profits in a detailed and organized manner
date.description2: 130% Net Profits with full commitment to organized and strict financial management and the lowest risk

method.title: Working Method
method.para1: Register on the site and create your own account
method.para2: Verify the account in simple and easy steps
method.para4: Deposit the capital to be invested in your account on the site
method.para5: Enjoy peace and prosperity while we work on your behalf

info.title: Important Information
info.para1: Activating any investment plan constitutes your acknowledgment and approval to invest this amount as previously explained in the plan specifications
info.para2: Once the plan is activated, this is my acknowledgment that I have received the amount
info.para3: The plan cannot be stopped after its activation until it’s expiry date
info.para4: The same plan will be reactivated automatically after its expiration, unless it is stopped within a maximum period of one day from the time it ends
info.para5: The commission percentage is calculated from the value of the investor's capital without affecting the basic capital
info.para6: The commission is calculated as soon as the investor activates the package and can be directly withdrawal
